buginformation.summary: patricia trie prefix map clear throws null pointer exception
buginformation.description: clearing all entries prefixmap returned patriciatrie using the clear method throws nullpointerexception the workaround removing each entry using the remove method seems work here are the test cases for the bug and the workaround public class patriciatrietest private trie string integer trie before public void setup trie new patriciatrie integer trie put anna trie put anael trie put analu trie put andreas trie put andrea trie put andres trie put anatole test public void testprefixmapclear sortedmap string integer prefixmap trie prefixmap and assertequals new hashset arrays aslist andrea andreas andres prefixmap keyset assertequals arrays aslist new arraylist prefixmap values prefixmap clear asserttrue prefixmap keyset isempty asserttrue prefixmap values isempty assertequals new hashset arrays aslist anael analu anatole anna trie keyset assertequals arrays aslist new arraylist trie values test public void testprefixmapclearusingremove sortedmap string integer prefixmap trie prefixmap and assertequals new hashset arrays aslist andrea andreas andres prefixmap keyset assertequals arrays aslist new arraylist prefixmap values set string keys new hashset string prefixmap keyset for final string key keys prefixmap remove key asserttrue prefixmap keyset isempty asserttrue prefixmap values isempty assertequals new hashset arrays aslist anael analu anatole anna trie keyset assertequals arrays aslist new arraylist trie values the stacktrace the nullpointerexception thrown the testprefixmapclear test case java lang nullpointerexception org apache commons collections trie abstractpatriciatrie prefixrangeentryset entryiterator remove abstractpatriciatrie java 2370 java util abstractcollection clear abstractcollection java 432 java util abstractmap clear abstractmap java 288 patriciatrietest testprefixmapclear patriciatrietest java
